casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
NAVARRA S245513 Supreme Court of California JANUARY 24, 2018 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of related issues in People v. Padilla, S239454, People v. Mendoza, S238032, and People v. Superior Court (Lara), S241231 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court.
